attributes.action: Urge the Polish government to reconsider its approach to abortion
attributes.additional_details: The UK Government should urge the Polish Government to reconsider its approach to abortion and ensure that women's rights are protected.
attributes.background: Poland already has some of the strictest legislation on abortion in Europe, and it is possible these will be tightened, at a time when protest is almost impossible due to the coronavirus outbreak.
